0.Name: Demon Toad
0.Power 2 - Range: When the toad takes damage: Near burst 1
0.Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
0.Power 3 - Effect: The demon toad jumps 4 squares, without provoking opportunity attacks.
0.Power 4 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the demon toad has not received a command that turn, it attacks or charges the nearest dazed creature, otherwise the nearest creature.

1.Name: Hopping Imp
1.Aura: *Curse (Psychic) aura 1:* Each time a creature in the aura misses on an attack, it takes 1d8 + your Charisma modifier psychic damage.
1.Power 1 - Effect: the target takes 5 persistent poison damage (save ends).
1.Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier poison damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
1.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hopping imp has not received a command that turn, it attacks or charges the nearest slowed creature, otherwise the nearest creature.

2.Name: Burner Demon
2.Power 1 - Effect: 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. *Miss:* A random creature adjacent to the burner demon takes 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
2.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the burner demon has not received a command that turn, it makes a *quick flicking fire* attack against the nearest square occupied by a creature.

3.Name: Hellhound
3.Power 1 - Effect: 2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. *Miss:* Make a *fiery breath* attack as a free action, if available.
3.Power 2 - Effect: 1d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target takes persistent 5 fire damage (save ends).
3.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hellhound has not received a command that turn, it charges its quarry if within charging distance, otherwise it runs towards the quarry. If its quarry is not in line of sight, the hellhound attacks or charges the nearest creature.

4.Name: Hezrou
4.Aura: *Demonic Stench aura 1:* Creatures in the aura cannot heal.
4.Power 1 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is grappled.
4.Power 2 - Effect: A creature the hezrou has grappled takes 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
4.Power 3 - Effect: The hezrou jumps 4 squares, without provoking opportunity attacks.
4.Power 4 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hezrou has not received a command that turn, it constricts if it is grappling a creature. Otherwise it attacks or charges the nearest creature.

5.Name: Hungry Maw
5.Aura: *Chomp and Chew aura 1:* A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura takes 10 persistent damage (save ends).
5.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the hungry maw has not received a command that turn, it attacks a random creature within reach or moves towards the nearest creature if none are within reach.

6.Name: Vulture Demon
6.Power 1 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes 5 persistent poison damage (save ends).
6.Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
6.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the vulture demon has not received a command that turn, it uses *demonic screech* even if it has already used it this encounter, positioned to include as many targets as possible.

7.Name: Big Burner
7.Power 1 - Effect: 3d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage. *Miss:* A random creature adjacent to the big burner takes 2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
7.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the big burner has not received a command that turn, it makes a *quick flicking fire* attack against the nearest square occupied by a creature.

8.Name: Boar Demon (Nalfeshnee)
8.Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic and lightning damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
8.Power 3 - Range: When the boar demon is reduced to 0 HP or below: Near burst 2
8.Power 3 - Effect: the target is pushed 2 and dazed (save ends); *Effect:* The boar demon is destroyed.
8.Power 4 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the boar demon has not received a command that turn, it falls to 0 HP and triggers *horror nimbus*.

9.Name: Frenzy Demon
9.Aura: *Aura of Frustration aura 3:* Each time a creature within the aura misses on an attack roll, the frenzy demon gets a +2 power bonus to its next attack roll.
9.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the frenzy demon has not received a command that turn, it moves towards the nearest creature and uses *raking claws*.

10.Name: Pincer Demon (Glabrezu)
10.Power 2 - Effect: 1d10 + Charisma modifier force damage, and the target falls prone.
10.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the pincer demon has not received a command that turn, it uses *chaos hammer* centered on you, if possible. Otherwise, it moves towards the nearest creature and uses *pincer*.

11.Name: Laughing Demon
11.Aura: *Aura of Mockery aura 3:* A creature within the aura that fails a saving throw takes 15 damage.
11.Power 1 - Effect: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and a creature adjacent to the target takes 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
11.Power 2 - Effect: The laughing demon makes two *tooth and claw* attacks.
11.Power 3 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the laughing demon has not received a command that turn, it teleports to an unoccupied square adjacent to a random creature within 20, and uses *tooth and claw and stomp*.

12.Name: Balor
12.Aura: *Aura of Flame (Fire) aura 2:* A creature that enters or begins its turn in the aura takes 20 fire damage.
12.Power 1 - Effect: 2d12 + Charisma modifier fire and necrotic damage.
12.Power 2 - Effect: the target is knocked prone and pulled 3.
12.Power 3 - Effect: If a non-mook creature is killed within the balor’s aura, the balor’s summoner regains a recovery and the balor heals equal to your recovery value.
12.Power 4 - Range: The balor is reduced to 0 HP or below: Near burst 5
12.Power 4 - Effect: 2d12 + your Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the balor is destroyed.
12.Power 5 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the balor has not received a command that turn, it moves so the nearest creature is in range of its *flame whip*, then uses the *flame whip* and *longsword*.

13.Name: Marilith
13.Aura: *Wall of Steel aura 2:* A creature that leaves the aura takes 15 damage.
13.Power 2 - Effect: The marilith makes up to three *sword* attacks, each against a different target. The marilith may shift 1 after each attack.
13.Power 3 - Effect: For the rest of this turn, all attacks the marilith makes score a critical hit on a natural 15-20.
13.Power 5 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the marilith has not received a command that turn, it uses *three whirling swords* against an adjacent target. If there is no such target, it uses *beguiling gaze* against the nearest creature in range.

14.Name: Ape
14.Skills: Athletics +8 + half your level, Intimidate +5 + half your level
14.Description: Could also be used for a yeti.

15.Name: Arboreal Sapling
15.Description: Could also be used for a wood golem.

16.Name: Bear
16.Power 2 - Effect: The animal companion starts each battle with temporary hit points equal to double its level.
16.Skills: Endure +7 + half your level, Intimidate +5 + half your level
16.Description: Could also be used for a giant badger, wolverine or owlbear.

17.Name: Big Cat
17.Power 2 - Effect: On the first round of battle, the animal companion has combat advantage against any creature that has not yet acted.
17.Skills: Athletics +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level
17.Description: A lion, tiger, jaguar, leopard, cougar or other big cat.

18.Name: Blink Dog
18.Power 2 - Effect: After the animal companion is hit by an attack, and the attack is fully resolved, it can teleport 2.

19.Name: Bull
19.Skills: Endure +6 + half your level, Nature +7 + half your level
19.Description: A bull, buffalo, cow or yak. Could also be used for a boar.

21.Name: Giant Lizard
21.Skills: Athletics +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level
21.Description: A cave gecko, giant anole, giant iguana or other large climbing lizard.

22.Name: Giant Raptor
22.Skills: Perception +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level
22.Description: A hawk, eagle, owl, vulture, falcon, or other bird of prey.

23.Name: Giant Snake
23.Power 2 - Effect: The animal companion’s opportunity attacks also do 2 persistent poison damage (save ends). *Level 11:* 4 persistent poison damage. *Level 21:* 6 persistent poison damage.
23.Description: A venomous snake. Could also be a poisonous spider, toad or Gila monster.

25.Name: Hound
25.Power 2 - Effect: The animal companion does +2 damage when it has combat advantage against the target. *Level 11:* +4. *Level 21:* +6.
25.Skills: Endure +8 + half your level, Nature +6 + half your level
25.Description: A dog, wolf, coyote, jackal or hyena.

26.Name: Hunting Spider
26.Skills: Athletics +7 + half your level, Stealth +6 + half your level
26.Description: A web-throwing spider. Could also be used for a chameleon or a giant frog.

27.Name: Minor Dream Figment
27.Power 2 - Action: reaction, when a Melee attack hits you
27.Power 2 - Effect: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
27.Power 4 - Effect: At the end of your turn, if the minor dream figment has not received a command that turn, it makes a *pummel* attack against an adjacent enemy.

28.Name: Man-at-Arms
28.Skills: History +6 + half your level, Religion +6 + half your level
